45341 Annual statistics of wholesale and retail trade
===============================================
45342 Annual statistics: accommodation and food services
==================================================

Definition:
Subsidies include both subsidies directly related to
turnover (such as export refunds for sales of agricultural
products in non-EU countries) and other subsidies related to
business operations (for instance, for business-based
environmental protection measures).


47415 Structural survey of service activities
=======================================

Definition:
Subsidies are current and unrequited financial contributions
made by general government (Federation, the Länder and
municipalities) or the institutions of the European Union to
the survey unit for research and development projects or for
current business operations.
